price: 14. Todos ellos desmintieron a sus respectivos mensajeros, y se cumplió sobre ellos Mi castigo.
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
